headline: Evergy (EVRG) Price Target Reduced to $91
summary: Evergy, Inc. (NASDAQ:EVRG) is included among the 10 High Yield Utility Stocks to Buy in 2026. Evergy, Inc. (NASDAQ:EVRG) delivers electricity to approximately 1.7 million residential and commercial customers in homes and businesses in Kansas and Missouri. On January 23, RBC Capital analyst Stephen D’Ambrisi lowered its price target on Evergy, Inc. (NASDAQ:EVRG) from $93 […]

headline: Evergy Schedules Conference Call to Discuss 4th Quarter Results
summary: KANSAS CITY, Mo., January 29, 2026--Evergy, Inc. (NASDAQ: EVRG) announced today it will release its 2025 fourth quarter earnings Thursday, February 19, 2026, before market open. The company plans to host its quarterly conference call and audio webcast to discuss the results Thursday, February 19, 2026.
